snippet: The rookie quarterback E. J. Manuel led Buffalo over Indianapolis on Sunday in the preseason opener for both teams.
abstract: NFL Roundup; rookie quarterback E J Manuel, 16th overall pick in 2013 draft, goes 16 of 21 for 107 yards and a touchdown to lead Buffalo Bills to 44-20 victory against Indianapolis Colts in their preseason opener; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The rookie quarterback E. J. Manuel led Buffalo over Indianapolis on Sunday in the preseason opener for both teams.

headline.main: Bills’ Top Pick Plays Like One
headline.print_headline: Bills’ Top Pick Plays Like One
